mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Square Dance Vacations 1963", "Americana: The Old Maid, by Terry Golden", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "12th Annual National Square Dance Convention", "Sight Calling-An Opposing View, by Bill Peters", "Overseas Dateline", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshops", "Introduction to Basic Handbook", "Handbook Series: The Basic Movements of Square Dancing", "The Caller of the Month: Finis Nabore", "Paging the Roundancers: Scotty and Doris Garrett", "Current Best Sellers: Record Sales Survey", and "Experimental Lab: Wheel and Hook".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
